title: Marjorie Taylor Greene Is Re-Elected in Georgia
description: The Georgia Republican’s racist and antisemitic conspiracy theories put her on the party’s fringes, but she is likely to play a more central role in the next Congress.
dc:creator: Maggie Astor

media:content.media:credit: Rebecca Noble for The New York Times
media:content.media:description: Representative Marjorie Taylor Greene of Georgia, once seen as on the fringes of the Republican Party, won a second term in Congress, where she is poised to play a more central role.
